text: Fernando Sarasola (born 22 May 1966) is a Spanish equestrian. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Spain Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Fernando Sarasola
